content: quote: Originally posted by I_M_Qwerty: quote: Originally posted by Anbar7: Can I get a link... http://www.military.com/news/article/snap-call-quick-ki...free-us-hostage.html It more or less duplicates 3-4 other threads. Cut the OP some slack ... all he's trying to do is give an attaboy to the Seals. No need to come down hard and dirty on him. To quote Mainedawg from the General Discussion board.... "Folks, we have had a lot of fun with new posters on here in past few months. The trolls have always been and always will be a chew toy for us. But here is the other side of it. Too many new people are being badgered or just jumped on by the posters here. I know that we can tell a lot of the time if they are trolls, but some have been way off the mark lately. Please do not jump on the posters and help them as you would have liked help when you were knew to here. We have the wire thread to post beliefs about a possible troll. We have the other threads that are posted on every hour to use to let others know that you belief a troll in the wire. Please contact me or another Moderator and we will handle it. I don't want people suspended for disruptive posting, ya that one, or for posting to the poster and not the post. I know you all understand and we will still have lots of fun here. Anyone?" Don
